shortdesc.ph: Spatial position information of a remote user or media player.
Spatial position information of the remote user or media player.
Spatial position information of the remote user or media player.
Spatial position information of a remote user or media player.

p.codeblock: There are no corresponding names available

plentry.pd: Coordinates in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the coordinates in the forward, right, and up directions respectively.
Unit vector of the forward axis in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the forward, right, and up directions respectively.
Coordinates in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the coordinates in the forward, right, and up directions respectively.
Unit vector of the forward axis in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the directions in the forward, right, and up axes respectively.
Coordinates in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, where the three values represent the coordinates in the front, right, and up directions respectively.

Coordinates in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, with the three values representing the coordinates of the forward, right, and up directions, respectively. Forward, right, and up correspond to the positive directions of the z, x, and y axes of Unity's Vector3.

Unit vector of the forward axis in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, with the three values representing the coordinates of the forward, right, and up directions, respectively. Forward, right, and up correspond to the positive directions of the z, x, and y axes of Unity's Vector3.
